content:
Can you generate a table of the 10 most common pet names with their corresponding animal types and their popularity rankings? The data should be sorted by popularity in descending order.
Please use the following Excel table code:
| Animal Type | Pet Name | Popularity Ranking |
|-------------|----------|--------------------|
| Dog         | Max      | 1                  |
| Cat         | Bella    | 2                  |
| Dog         | Charlie  | 3                  |
| Cat         | Luna     | 4                  |
| Dog         | Lucy     | 5                  |
| Cat         | Oliver   | 6                  |
| Dog         | Cooper   | 7                  |
| Cat         | Smokey   | 8                  |
| Dog         | Buddy    | 9                  |
| Cat         | Tiger    | 10                 |

Here's the table of the 10 most common pet names with their corresponding animal types and popularity rankings, sorted by popularity in descending order:

| Animal Type | Pet Name | Popularity Ranking |
|-------------|----------|--------------------|
| Dog         | Max      | 1                  |
| Cat         | Bella    | 2                  |
| Dog         | Charlie  | 3                  |
| Cat         | Luna     | 4                  |
| Dog         | Lucy     | 5                  |
| Cat         | Oliver   | 6                  |
| Dog         | Cooper   | 7                  |
| Cat         | Smokey   | 8                  |
| Dog         | Buddy    | 9                  |
| Cat         | Tiger    | 10                 |
